name: family_relationship
description: The collection of data elements that describe the relationship between donors from the same family.  This table should be completed only if the Study is contributing data from groups of donors who share family ties (ex: twins, trios, sib-pairs).

fields.name: submitter_family_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the family, assigned by the data provider
Unique identifier of the donor 1, assigned by the data provider
fields.name: submitter_donor_id_1

fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor 2, assigned by the data provider
fields.name: submitter_donor_id_2

meta.notes: Refer to HL7 CodeSystem to identify relationship between donors http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
Refer to HL7 CodeSystem to identify relationship between donors http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
